titleStmt.title: Odes of Horace the best of lyrick poets contayning much morallity, and sweetnesse. Selected, and translated by Sr: T:H: 1625.
Selections. English
titleStmt.author: Horace.
T.H., Sir (Thomas Hawkins), d. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: By A[ugustine]: M[athewes]: for Will: Lee and are to be sold at his shoppe in Fleet-street, at the signe of the Goulden Bucke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Fleet-street, at the signe of the Goulden Bucke
